p: PH and P95 at 50 μg/ml gave the highest %inhibition of NO production (97.15% ± 0.37 and 97.66% ± 1.12, respectively) while FH, F95, F50, and S50 at 100 μg/ml gave the highest %inhibition of NO production (91.55% ± 3.04, 93.36% ± 3.23, 82.62% ± 1.26, and 81.94% ± 2.79, respectively). These results were not significantly different from prednisolone at 50 μg/ml (96.82% ± 0.34) ( Figure 3).
